name: To-You
description:
Jumping from platform to platform in search of something, or someone,  just to lose them again?  Is it worth trying and trying everytime to find the  one think that would make you happy?  Is it in our power to even stop?  Do we want to stop?  Or do we puch forward agains all odds, still hoping to reach them?

Join To in their infinite search for Aki.

Notes: This is my very first game, a little exploration of our view  of life and its ideals, the reasons that keep us moving. The presented example is love, but the main idea of seaching and reaching for something in life can apply to many more.  This is still in testing and I only plan on making it playable enough for now, as it's supposed to be a short little game for me to learn of. 

That being said, enjoy.
